Text: Terrible service, I am very disappointed.
Translated_Text: Terrible service, I am very disappointed.

Text: J'adore ce produit, il est fantastique!
Translated_Text: I love this product, it is fantastic!

Text: Could be better, but not bad.
Translated_Text: Could be better, but not bad.
I didn't like it at all.

Text: Service was slow, but the food was good.

Text: I’m not sure how I feel about this.

Text: Demasiado caro para lo que es.

Text: I will recommend this to my friends!
